channel.title: How do i host 2 servers at one time?
channel.description: Ok, I want to host 2 servers at 1 time 508 and 474. I have my 474 running i just want to make a 508. Imade it run on Port 5555 but how do i make it so like.... It runs on a certain ip....? lol... Thanks..

item.title: How do i host 2 servers at one time?

item.description:
@Motoguyx378 wrote:

Thanks again that’s your second time helping me and i never tried 508 before so… thanks!

item.title: How do i host 2 servers at one time?
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

They’ll both run on the same IP, just on different ports.
